heading: Apply for a new partnership
subheading: For this application you will need the following:
paragraphs: This form allows you to submit an application for a Primary Authority partnership with a chosen partner.
Before starting a new application, you must have been in contact with the partner and have a written summary document detailing the partnership.
After you submit the application, the partner has eight weeks to review it.
bulletPoints: A summary document detailing the partnership.

The local authority's contact details for each regulatory area.
